script.name: plugin.piracy.kidnapcivilians
script.description: Piracy: Kidnap Civilians: Kidnap passengers from vessels

line.comment: * KIDNAP CIVILIANS -by- MISTER BEAR v1.40
* Allows you to kidnap civilians from their vessels as Slaves
* BUG: Doesn't accept VIPS, prisoners etc.
* TODO: Reputation loss for stealing people!
* TODO: Direct beaming of astronauts
* TODO: Don't display the police bar if there are no more police to alert in the sector
* TODO: Use the `in transporter range` function
* Check requirements
* Play 'Targetting' at low priority
* Retrieve ENSLAVING / TRANSPORTING option
* Retrieve level of police interest local variable
* Define races array, used to create random passengers
* --------------------- PERFORM PRE-TRANSFER CALCULATIONS ---------------------
* Calculate number available and cargo bay capacity
* Abort if various requirements aren't met
* DEBUG SETTINGS
* Calculate time required based on number to kidnap
* Update values
* Increment progress counters and transfer passengers (As slaves)
* ensure requirements are still met, then transfer a passenger
* Increment police counter and alert a ship if appropriate
* Play a random video clip
* Switch to transporter mode after initialisation period
* Make ship a Foe unless it's abandonned
* Play background noise (1105 for specific beaming sound)
* Create transportation bar
* Create Police Progress bar
* Assemble output string
* save new wanted level
* Mark small ships derelict
* Stop vessel permenantly

line.text: -> set race logic control enabled to

line.comment: * Remove the shields
* Mark derelict and append 'deserted' to original name
* Display kidnapping results
* CALCULATE CAPACITY AND TRANSFER TARGET : Calculate number available to kidnap and number we can fit on the ship
* Determine how many slaves ship can hold, slaves and passengers have different volumes

line.text: -> get free volume of cargo bay

line.comment: * Calculate total 'real' passengers
* Add number of 'fake' passengers
* Add the pilot (only unclaimed small ships)
* Transfer as many slaves as possible, or at minimum 1 (the pilot)
* KIDNAP PASSENGER : Convert a passenger object (or passenger ware) into a passenger object or slave ware
* TRANSFER ONE PASSENGER and (possibly) enslave
* CONVERT TO SLAVE
* CONVERT ONE PASSENGER into a slave or create a randomized passenger object
* CREATE RANDOM PASSENGER : Create a random passenger
* Get race of the ship
* Create a mix of passengers based on race. Argon/Boron-even mix, split/teladi-40% mix, terran/paranid-no mix.
* Create passenger object
* EXIT IF REQUIREMENTS BROKEN : Inform user if requirements were broken, then quit
* ABORT: if target has been destroyed ["MALFUNCTION", "TARGET LOST"] [HIGH PRIORITY]
* get some target properties
* ABORT: if pilot ejected AND there's no passengers ["MALFUNCTION", "PASSENGERS", "NOT AVAILABLE"] [HIGH PRIORITY]
* AND its not the last iteration, where there are no passengers. pilot is imaginar

line.var: 'ERROR: There is no-one aboard to transport.'

line.comment: * ABORT: if out of range ["MALFUNCTION", "TARGET OUTSIDE TRANSPORTER RANGE.."] [HIGH PRIORITY]

line.var: 'ERROR: Target outside transporter range, teleportation is impossible.'

line.comment: * ABORT: if shields go above 10% ["MALFUNCTION", "SHIELDS", "WORKING"] [HIGH PRIORITY]

line.var: 'ERROR: Target shields must be below 15% for transporter device to function.'

line.comment: * = speak text: page=17 id=3973 priority=2
* EXIT IF CRITICAL PROBLEM: Don't even begin if a) nothing is selected b) we have no cargo space
* Abort if nothing is selected ["MALFUNCTION", "NO AIM"] [HIGH PRIORITY]

line.var: 'ERROR: You have not selected a target.'

line.comment: * Abort if we can't hold any slaves ["MALFUNCTION", "NOT ENOUGH SPACE IN CARGO HOLD"]

line.var: 'ERROR: Not enough space in cargo hold for any slaves.'

line.comment: * Abort if not a civilian ship ["MALFUNCTION", "CIVILIAN SHIP", "NOT AVAILABLE"]

line.var: 'ERROR: Transport is only possible from civilian vessels'

line.comment: * DISPLAY RESULTS AND EXIT : Display amount kidnapped before whatever happened to cancel transport
* Play "Passengers", "Transferred", "Cargo bay now contains", "Slaves" [LOW PRIORITY]
* Play "You have lost recognition"
* END COMMAND : Disable the 'mutex' and exit

sval.val: Piracy: Kidnap Civilians: Kidnap passengers from vessels
Initialising : %s
%s / %s
%s : %s Police : %s Alerted
%s (Deserted)
ERROR: Target vessel was destroyed.
ERROR: There is no-one aboard to transport.
ERROR: Target outside transporter range, teleportation is impossible.
ERROR: Target shields must be below 15% for transporter device to function.
ERROR: You have not selected a target.
ERROR: Not enough space in cargo hold for any slaves.
ERROR: Transport is only possible from civilian vessels
Transported %s out of %s passengers successfully.
KIDNAP CIVILIANS -by- MISTER BEAR v1.40
Allows you to kidnap civilians from their vessels as Slaves
BUG: Doesn't accept VIPS, prisoners etc.
TODO: Reputation loss for stealing people!
TODO: Direct beaming of astronauts
TODO: Don't display the police bar if there are no more police to alert in the sector
TODO: Use the `in transporter range` function
Check requirements
Play 'Targetting' at low priority
Retrieve ENSLAVING / TRANSPORTING option
Retrieve level of police interest local variable
Define races array, used to create random passengers
--------------------- PERFORM PRE-TRANSFER CALCULATIONS ---------------------
Calculate number available and cargo bay capacity
Abort if various requirements aren't met
DEBUG SETTINGS
Calculate time required based on number to kidnap
Update values
Increment progress counters and transfer passengers (As slaves)
ensure requirements are still met, then transfer a passenger
Increment police counter and alert a ship if appropriate
Play a random video clip
Switch to transporter mode after initialisation period
Make ship a Foe unless it's abandonned
Play background noise (1105 for specific beaming sound)
Create transportation bar
Create Police Progress bar
Assemble output string
save new wanted level
Mark small ships derelict
Stop vessel permenantly
Remove the shields
Mark derelict and append 'deserted' to original name
Display kidnapping results
CALCULATE CAPACITY AND TRANSFER TARGET : Calculate number available to kidnap and number we can fit on the ship
Determine how many slaves ship can hold, slaves and passengers have different volumes
Calculate total 'real' passengers
Add number of 'fake' passengers
Add the pilot (only unclaimed small ships)
Transfer as many slaves as possible, or at minimum 1 (the pilot)
KIDNAP PASSENGER : Convert a passenger object (or passenger ware) into a passenger object or slave ware
TRANSFER ONE PASSENGER and (possibly) enslave
CONVERT TO SLAVE
CONVERT ONE PASSENGER into a slave or create a randomized passenger object
CREATE RANDOM PASSENGER : Create a random passenger
Get race of the ship
Create a mix of passengers based on race. Argon/Boron-even mix, split/teladi-40% mix, terran/paranid-no mix.
Create passenger object
EXIT IF REQUIREMENTS BROKEN : Inform user if requirements were broken, then quit
ABORT: if target has been destroyed ["MALFUNCTION", "TARGET LOST"] [HIGH PRIORITY]
get some target properties
ABORT: if pilot ejected AND there's no passengers ["MALFUNCTION", "PASSENGERS", "NOT AVAILABLE"] [HIGH PRIORITY]
AND its not the last iteration, where there are no passengers. pilot is imaginar
ABORT: if out of range ["MALFUNCTION", "TARGET OUTSIDE TRANSPORTER RANGE.."] [HIGH PRIORITY]
ABORT: if shields go above 10% ["MALFUNCTION", "SHIELDS", "WORKING"] [HIGH PRIORITY]
EXIT IF CRITICAL PROBLEM: Don't even begin if a) nothing is selected b) we have no cargo space
Abort if nothing is selected ["MALFUNCTION", "NO AIM"] [HIGH PRIORITY]
Abort if we can't hold any slaves ["MALFUNCTION", "NOT ENOUGH SPACE IN CARGO HOLD"]
Abort if not a civilian ship ["MALFUNCTION", "CIVILIAN SHIP", "NOT AVAILABLE"]
DISPLAY RESULTS AND EXIT : Display amount kidnapped before whatever happened to cancel transport
Play "Passengers", "Transferred", "Cargo bay now contains", "Slaves" [LOW PRIORITY]
Play "You have lost recognition"
END COMMAND : Disable the 'mutex' and exit
